channel.title: Amino Acid Sensing on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in Amino Acid Sensing on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: Nutrient sensing mTORC1 pathway
item.description: Nutrient sensing is a fundamental biological process that enables organisms to adapt to their environment by regulating cell growth and metabolism in response to nutrient availability. mTOR signaling pathway is evolved to be able to sense environmental cues and coordinates cellular growth, we are focusing the question: How does mTOR sense nutritional cues and coordinates cellular growth ?
